amendment.description: Amendment increases Payment In Lieu of Taxes (PILT) funding by $20 million; provides $30 million for deficit reduction; and reduces fossil energy research and development funding by $50 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 13 and printed in the Congressional Record to increase Payment In Lieu of Taxes (PILT) funding by $20 million, apply $30 million to deficit reduction, and reduce fossil energy research and development funding by $50 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 248 - 169 (Roll no. 282).
